faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about nano banana AI technology

items.question: What is Nano Banana AI?
items.answer: Nano Banana is Google's Gemini 2.5 Flash Image model - a lightweight, ultra-fast AI image generation technology that creates high-quality 1024Ã—1024 images in just 2.3 seconds while maintaining perfect element consistency across multiple scenes.

items.question: How fast is nano banana compared to other AI models?
items.answer: Nano banana AI generates images in 2.3 seconds, making it approximately 10x faster than traditional AI image generation models, while maintaining comparable or superior quality. This makes it ideal for time-sensitive projects and high-volume content creation.

items.question: What makes nano banana's element consistency special?
items.answer: Unlike other AI models that struggle with character consistency, nano banana AI acts like your personal AI designer - maintaining 100% consistency of characters, objects, and styles across different scenes, poses, and environments. Generate spring, summer, fall, and winter versions with perfect visual coherence.

items.question: Can I use nano banana AI images for commercial purposes?
items.answer: Yes! Images generated with nano banana AI through BananaEditor are commercial-ready and optimized for e-commerce, advertising, social media, and marketing materials. The technology includes accurate text rendering and understands commercial visual requirements.

items.question: Is nano banana AI suitable for professional work?
items.answer: Absolutely. Nano banana AI (Gemini 2.5 Flash Image) delivers professional-grade quality with high FID scores, accurate text rendering, and exceptional visual fidelity. It's trusted by businesses for e-commerce, advertising agencies, and content creators worldwide.
